Title: Santa's Slay
Descriptions: Sebastian: I don't wanna be no grinch, but we've had reports of unusually strong zombies appearing all over Livonia - and they're dressed like Santa Clause. If you do your part to keep Livonia safe by killing at least one of these jolly bastards every day, I'll give you a little present for the trouble. There's some pretty good stuff in my collection - you never know what you'll get.

Sebastian: I don't wanna be no grinch, but we've had reports of unusually strong zombies appearing all over Livonia - and they're dressed like Santa Clause. If you do your part to keep Livonia safe by killing at least one of these jolly bastards every day, I'll give you a little present for the trouble. There's some pretty good stuff in my collection - you never know what you'll get.
Sebastian: Looks like you'll be getting coal for Christmas. Thanks survivor, come back tomorrow if you want to kill another one for another gift.
